problem.markdown:
1. Which of the following can not be a function representing output motion of scotch yoke mechanism (t is time)?
() sin t () cos t () None of these (x) tan t
2. For crank radius 10cm what is the distance between extremes of the reciprocating part in scotch yoke mechanism?
(x) 20cm () 10cm () 5cm () None of these
3. Angular velocity of crank is equivalent to
() amplitude of SHM (x) frequency of oscillation in SHM () none of these () phase lag of SHM
4. Scotch yoke mechanism follows SHM.
(x) True () False
5. Which of the following can not be representing output motion of scotch yoke mechanism
() sin(t+k) () sin(t) (x) All given options can be representing output motion of scotch yoke mechanism () k+sin(t)
problem.p: 1. Which of the following can not be a function representing output motion of scotch yoke mechanism (t is time)?
2. For crank radius 10cm what is the distance between extremes of the reciprocating part in scotch yoke mechanism?
3. Angular velocity of crank is equivalent to
5. Which of the following can not be representing output motion of scotch yoke mechanism

choicegroup.choice: All given options can be representing output motion of scotch yoke mechanism
